localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
blogPost.body: Memo enriches your conversations making it super easy to share links, videos, galleries and loads more. Comment on any word, sentence or paragraph in Memo messages. Send longer-form messages with rich media embedded to anyone using their email address.
blogPost.title: Memo - Async conversations with your friends, fans, and team
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 备忘录丰富了您的对话，让您可以轻松分享链接、视频、图库等更多内容。在Memo信息中对任何单词、句子或段落进行评论。使用电子邮件地址向任何人发送内嵌丰富媒体的长篇消息。
localize.tagline: 与您的朋友、粉丝和团队进行异步对话。

localize.description: 備忘錄豐富了您的對話，讓您可以輕鬆分享鏈接、視頻、圖庫等更多內容。在Memo信息中對任何單詞、句子或段落進行評論。使用電子郵件地址向任何人發送內嵌豐富媒體的長篇消息。
localize.tagline: 與您的朋友、粉絲和團隊進行異步對話。

previous.excerpt: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! 🔥
previous.title: SquadPal - Build stronger connections & have fun with your remote team

localize.description: SquadPal是你的远程/混合团队的生活应用。通过游戏、挑战和有趣的活动，SquadPal帮助您创建一个安全的空间，与您的团队成员建立更好的联系。今天就开始吧，20人以下的团队都可以免费使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 与您的远程团队建立更紧密的联系并享受乐趣。

localize.description: SquadPal是你的遠程/混合團隊的生活應用。通過遊戲、挑戰和有趣的活動，SquadPal幫助您創建一個安全的空間，與您的團隊成員建立更好的聯繫。今天就開始吧，20人以下的團隊都可以免費使用。🔥
localize.tagline: 與您的遠程團隊建立更緊密的聯繫並享受樂趣。

next.excerpt: Do what matters most. Daily Four is all about getting the important things done with minimal stress. Reflect on your past achievements whenever you need a dose of perspective.

localize.description: 做最重要的事。每日四点就是要用最小的压力完成重要的事情。每当你需要透视的时候，就反思一下你过去的成就。
做最重要的事。每日四點就是要用最小的壓力完成重要的事情。每當你需要透視的時候，就反思一下你過去的成就。
